title: CDA, EOBI collaborate on mega commercial projects in Islamabad
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 29 (APP):The Capital Development Authority (CDA) and the Employees’ Old-Age Benefits Institution (EOBI) have agreed to collaborate on mega commercial projects in Islamabad.
The partnership aims to enhance revenue generation and contribute to the city’s development.
During a meeting between CDA Chairman Muhammad Ali Randhawa and EOBI Chairman Khaqan Murtaza, on Monday, various commercial initiatives and projects were discussed.
EOBI chairman expressed keen interest in investing in these projects, recognizing their potential for substantial returns.
Chairman CDA said the collaboration will explore new avenues for investment and development within Islamabad, with CDA sharing a basket of projects with EOBI for future collaboration.
This strategic partnership marks a pivotal step towards enhancing the infrastructure and economic landscape of Islamabad, reflecting a shared commitment to progress and prosperity.
